mapper.select:
select * from inquiry i LEFT JOIN quote q on i.id = q.inquiry_id LEFT JOIN sys_pro_check c on q.id = c.quote_id
q.is_active = 1 and i.is_active = 1 and c.finally_audit = 0 and i.id = #{inquiryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select q.*,c.*, ss.supplier ss_supplier from inquiry i LEFT JOIN quote q on i.id = q.inquiry_id LEFT JOIN sys_pro_check c on q.id = c.quote_id LEFT JOIN supply_supplier ss on q.supplier_id = ss.id
q.is_active = 1 and i.is_active = 1 and i.id = #{inquiryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
